SELECT 
  count(*)::int as total_connections,
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE state = 'active')::int as active_connections,
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE state = 'idle')::int as idle_connections,
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE state = 'idle in transaction')::int as leaked_connections,
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE application_name LIKE '%n8n%')::int as n8n_connections,
  (SELECT setting::int FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'max_connections') as max_connections,
  ROUND((count(*)::numeric / (SELECT setting::int FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'max_connections')) * 100, 1) as utilization_pct
FROM pg_stat_activity
WHERE datname = current_database();

=INSERT INTO core.metrics (metric_name, metric_value, tags)
VALUES 
  ('postgres_total_connections', {{ $json.total_connections }}, '{"source": "monitor"}'::jsonb),
  ('postgres_n8n_connections', {{ $json.n8n_connections }}, '{"source": "monitor"}'::jsonb),
  ('postgres_leaked_connections', {{ $json.leaked_connections }}, '{"source": "monitor"}'::jsonb),
  ('postgres_utilization_pct', {{ $json.utilization_pct }}, '{"max": {{ $json.max_connections }}}'::jsonb)
RETURNING metric_name, metric_value;
